description.action: Evan, now in human form, holds up the scroll he found, revealing the contract that Bowser had signed, promising to free all the enslaved children if he were ever defeated.
Isaac, also in human form, watches intently as Evan presents the scroll, understanding the significance of this discovery.
Aurelia stands alongside her siblings, a relieved expression on her face now that Bowser has been defeated and the contract has been revealed.
Aaron, no longer in dinosaur form, looks around at his free siblings, ready to assist them in liberating the other enslaved children.
Bowser, trapped under the cape, glares angrily at the children, realizing that his defeat means he must now uphold his promise to free all the enslaved children.
